mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Premiere fête de la liberté a l'occasion des Suisses de château-vieux
First festival of liberty at the Swiss château-vieux
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Several horses pull a large, throne-type seat affixed to a carriage with a larger-than-life man on the seat. Cheering citizens crowd around the carriage and stand along the parade line, which circles an equestrian statue in a large square
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
